info.name: stylish12306
info.description:
A test stylish for 12306.cn

Don't use it until developing finished.

More paddings added to the cards and adjusted the title font-weight to make it more Materialize.
info.additionalInfo:
This is the second test version. Please install the style after the first release came out. Github version info.

测试版本，请暂时不要使用，欢迎关注开发进度和版本信息。
